## Prerequisites
- [ ] I have read the [governance](../../GOVERNANCE.md)

## Type
- [ ] Group
- [ ] Individual

## Required fields
- Name:
- Short description (1 sentence):
- Status (Active, On hold, Inactive):
- Link (repo or website):
- Contact channel (email, Slack channel, GitHub handle, etc.):

## Notes
- Optional context or wording preferences.
